body: You possess some of the dominating powers of your vampire progenitor.
name: Natural Charmer
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Dhampirs/New Racial Rules/Dhampir Feats/Natural Charmer

sections.body: You can take 20 on any Charisma-based skills to charm, convince, persuade, or seduce humanoids whose attitude is at least friendly to you. Taking 20 still requires 20 times the normal time to perform the skill.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You cannot take 20 on any check where you incur penalties for failure.
sections.name: Normal
